Full Name: ARPEGGIATOR GATE TIME *** (+64 GIVES TIED NOTE IN MONO MODE)
ARP PATTERN (0..7 = up, down, ud1, ud2, order, random, chord, drum)
ENVELOPE MONO MULTI MODES (see packed parameter 1)
FILTER Q NORMALISE (127=zero filter drive at max resonance)
LFO1 DELAY (GRADUAL ONSET TIME/ ONE-SHOT MODE DELAY)
LFO2 DELAY (GRADUAL ONSET TIME/ ONE-SHOT MODE DELAY)
LFO DELAY MONO MULTI MODE (see packed parameter 4)
LFO 1,2 KEYSYNC / LOCK / ONE-SHOT (see packed parameter 5)
OSC1 PULSE WIDTH POSITION *** (0=50% or in-phase double wave)
OSC2 PULSE WIDTH POSITION *** (0=50% or in-phase double wave)
OSC3 PULSE WIDTH POSITION *** (0=50% or in-phase double wave)
OSC 1,2,3 OCTAVE / OSC 1>2 SYNC (see packed parameter 3)
UNISON / VOICE TYPE / FILTER TYPE (see packed parameter 2)
VOICE TO OUTPUT & EFFECTS LEVEL BOOST (0..30dB)
